column4: I hava poblem with GRUB,  UPDATE MANAGER erase lines with linux and linux recovery and aafter boot I can see only WINDOWS 7 and WINDOWS VISTA, I tried to type SUDO UPDATE-GRUB but it says "grub-probe: error: cannot find a device for /. " ANY IDEA what happen and how to fix?
